name: Cybarian: The Time Traveling Warrior
description:
Get the Sword of Ages, travel to the future and try to live long enough to brag about it!

Drawing inspiration from old school platformers, Cybarian: The Time Travelling Warrior is an arcade title with some beat ‘em up gameplay qualities. Across four levels, players must take control of Cybarian, a warrior who discovers the Sword of Ages and gets transported to a cyberpunk future.

Features:
* Beautifully animated and expertly realised retro-style pixel art.
* Epic boss battles!
* Expand your abilities!
* Explosive and engaging combat!
* Classic 2D platforming
* 3 supported difficulties (Easy, Normal and Hard)
